summary: Successfully completed comprehensive testing of new Project Home and Task Management features. All core functionality working: Bento Grid dashboard, Kanban board, Eisenhower Matrix, task creation/updates, and real-time stats.

design_issues.issue: Console warnings about missing Description for DialogContent (accessibility)
No option to set priority/quadrant during task creation - defaults to q2 instead of allowing q1 selection

passed_tests: Backend API health check (14/14 endpoints working)
Task management APIs (create, list, update, delete)
Project Home Bento Grid layout with PROJECT VELOCITY card
SOURCE OF TRUTH card showing high priority docs
FEED card showing recent activity timeline
Task 'Deploy MVP' appears in Kanban Todo column
Task appears in Eisenhower Matrix SCHEDULE quadrant
Task status update from Todo to In Progress via Next button
Status changes persist across page navigation
Project Home stats update to reflect new task count

success_percentage.backend: 100% (14/14 API endpoints working including new task management)
success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all major flows working, minor accessibility warnings)

action_item_for_main_agent: Consider adding priority/quadrant selection in task creation form to allow users to create high-priority q1 tasks directly. Current implementation defaults to q2 (SCHEDULE) quadrant.
